DataElement.preferredName: Biologically-Derived Material Product Material Characteristic Behavior Code Sentinel CDM Blood Type
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Natural substances derived from living organisms such as cells, tissues, proteins, and DNA._The end result of a manufacturing process; anything that is produced._The tangible substance that goes into the makeup of a physical object._The distinguishing qualities or prominent aspect of a person, object, action, process, or substance._The actions or reactions of an object or organism, usually in relation to the environment or surrounding world of stimuli._A symbol or combination of symbols which is assigned to the members of a collection._Blood type and Rh factors, left-justified.  Convert any text Rh factor to symbols (e.g., pos to +, negative to -).  Rh factor can be blank.
